id: scenario-autonomous-entity-community-investor-scenarios-municipality-community investment supports municipal affordable housing development
title: Community investment supports municipal affordable housing development
description: Community investment supports municipal affordable housing development
content:
Scenario: Community investment supports municipal affordable housing development
    Given housing is major community need and investment opportunity
    And Patricia wants to invest in affordable housing with democratic governance
    When community investment expands to housing cooperatives
    Then her capital supports converting apartment buildings to resident ownership
    And affordable housing is preserved through democratic governance
    And housing investment provides returns while addressing municipal affordability crisis
    And community wealth-building extends to housing alongside businesses
    And municipality_elohim coordinates housing cooperative investment and development
